no_connection_file.console: No connection file found for guild: %guild_name%

could_not_execute_command.description: %emoji_error% An unknown error occurred while executing this command. Please try again.

login.console:
Bot logged in as %client_tag% and with prefix: %prefix%
Bot is on %guild_count% servers.

ping.title: Hey, I'm %client_username%! :wave:
ping.description: I use slash commands. Type `/help` if you need more help to a specific command.

guild_create.console:
Joined a guild: %guild_name%: %guild_member_count% members.
Bot is now on %guild_count% servers!

guild_delete.console:
Left a guild: %guild_name%: %guild_member_count% members.
Bot is now on %guild_count% servers!

disconnected.console: Successfully deleted connection file of guild: %guild_name%

settings.title: %emoji_settings% Settings %emoji_settings%
settings.content: Setup and settings such as `/connect` or `/disable`.

information.content:
**All commands in a category** can be viewed with: **/help <category>**.
**Still need help?** => [Support Discord Server](%invite_link%)

**More info about a command** can be viewed with: **/help <command>**.
**Still need help?** => [Support Discord Server](%invite_link%)

disabled.description:
You can find helpful information here.
```diff
- [COMMAND DISABLED]```

choose.title: Select Message Types
choose.description: Select all message types you want the bot to send. (You have 20 seconds to select)

chat.label: Chat Messages
chat.description: Send a message whenever a player chats.

join.label: Join Messages
join.description: Send a message whenever a player joins the server.

quit.label: Quit Messages
quit.description: Send a message whenever a player leaves the server.

advancement.label: Advancement Messages
advancement.description: Send a message whenever a player completes an advancement.

death.label: Death Messages
death.description: Send a message whenever a player dies.

player_command.label: Player Command Messages
player_command.description: Send a message whenever a command is sent by a player.

console_command.label: Console Command Messages
console_command.description: Send a message whenever a command is sent by the console.

block_command.label: Block Command Messages
block_command.description: Send a message whenever a command block is executed.

start.label: Startup Messages
start.description: Send a message whenever the server starts up.

close.label: Shutdown Messages
close.description: Send a message whenever the server shuts down.

invalid_port.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify a port that is bigger than 0 and smaller than 65536.

no_username.description: %emoji_warning% Please specify your minecraft java-edition account name.

invalid_method.description: %emoji_warning% Method **%method%** is not a valid connection method.

user_pinged.title: No Username Specified
user_pinged.description: %emoji_warning% Don't ping someone. Specify your **minecraft java-edition account name** instead.

version_below_11.title: Version Below 1.11
version_below_11.description: %emoji_warning% The advancement command might not work because advancements don't exist in your minecraft version yet.

version_below_7.title: Version Below 1.7
version_below_7.description: %emoji_warning% The stat and advancement commands might not work because stats and advancements don't exist in your minecraft version yet.

connecting.title: Connecting...
connecting.description: Connecting to ftp... (Can take up to one minute)

searching_level.title: Searching For World
searching_level.description: %emoji_success% Successfully connected with the ftp server. Searching world folder... (Can take up to one minute)

check_dms.title: Check Your DMs
check_dms.description: %emoji_red_success% Please check your DMs to complete the connection.

could_not_dm.title: Could Not DM
could_not_dm.description: %emoji_warning% Could not DM you. Verifying in the current channel...

verification.title: Code Verification
verification.description:
Please check the console of your minecraft server and enter the verification code from the server console below this message.
**You have 3 minutes to reply.**

could_not_connect_ftp.description: %emoji_error% Could not connect to server with ftp, sftp or ftps. Please check your credentials and try again.

not_completely_disconnected.description: %emoji_warning% The server (**%ip%**) is not completely disconnected. Please disconnect it manually by **deleting** the following file: `Server Folder/plugins/Discord-Linker/connection.conn` or by **removing** the plugin completely.

automatically_disconnected.description: %emoji_warning% Automatically disconnected from the old server (**%ip%**) to ensure no complications happen.

channel_not_added.description: %emoji_warning% The specified channel is not added.

no_webhook_permission.description: %emoji_error% The Bot does not have the `Manage Webhooks` permission. Please disable webhooks for this chatchannel or add the permission.

could_not_add_webhook.description: %emoji_error% The chatchannel webhook got deleted for an unknown reason and could not be re-added.

no_permission.title: No Permission
no_permission.description: %emoji_no_entry% This button can only be used by admins.

command.name: command
command.description: Set the command or category of which you want to get infos.

advancements.name: advancements
advancements.long_description: Look up your and other member's unlocked/completed recipes/advancements. You can find a list of all advancement (ids) [here](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Advancement#List_of_advancements).
advancements.short_description: Look up your and other member's minecraft advancements.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the advancement from.

inventory.name: inventory
inventory.long_description: Get an image of the current player's inventory.
inventory.short_description: Get an image of the current player's inventory.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the inventory from.

stats.name: stats
stats.long_description:
Look at your and other member's minecraft server stats.
All Categories (ids) can be found [here](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Statistics#Statistic_types_and_names)!
All stats of the `custom` category can be found [here](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Statistics#Statistic_types_and_names).
stats.short_description: Look at your and other member's minecraft server stats.
stats.example:
/stats mined iron_ore @Lianecx
/stats custom play_time BastiGHG
/stats killed blaze ILoveCheese

custom.name: custom
custom.description: A multitude of generic statistics related to a player's actions.

stat.name: stat
stat.description: Set a custom stat. All stats of the custom category => /help stats

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

mined.name: mined
mined.description: Statistic related to the number of blocks a player mined.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

broken.name: broken
broken.description: Statistics related to the number of items a player ran their durability negative.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

crafted.name: crafted
crafted.description: Statistics related to the number of items crafted, smelted, etc.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

used.name: used
used.description: Statistics related to the number of block or item used.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

picked_up.name: picked_up
picked_up.description: Statistics related to the number of dropped items a player picked up.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

dropped.name: dropped
dropped.description: Statistics related to the number of items that dropped.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

killed.name: killed
killed.description: Statistics related to the number of entities a player killed.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

killed_by.name: killed_by
killed_by.description: Statistics related to the times of a player being killed by entities.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

ban.name: ban
ban.long_description: Ban a player from the **minecraft server**. Can only be used with `Ban member` permission!
ban.short_description: Ban a player from the minecraft server.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to ban.

reason.name: reason
reason.description: Set a reason for the ban.

deop.name: deop
deop.long_description: Deop players on the **minecraft-server**. Can only be used by admins.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to deop.

command.name: command
command.long_description: Execute any command on the **minecraft-server**. Can only be executed by admins.
command.short_description: Execute any command on the minecraft-server.
command.example:
/command gamemode creative Lianecx
/command give Lianecx Golden Apple
/command tp @a 0 0 0

kick.name: kick
kick.long_description: Kick a player from the **minecraft server**. Can only be used with `Kick member` permission!
kick.short_description: Kick a player from the minecraft server.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to kick.

reason.name: reason
reason.description: Set a reason for the kick.

op.name: op
op.long_description: OP players on the **minecraft-server**. Can only be used by admins.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to OP.

unban.name: unban
unban.long_description: Unban a banned player from the **minecraft-server**. Can only be used with `Ban member` permissions.
unban.short_description: Unban a banned player from the minecraft-server.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to unban.

whitelist.name: whitelist
whitelist.long_description: Manage the whitelist of the **minecraft-server**. Can only be used by administrators.
whitelist.short_description: Manage the whitelist of the minecraft-server.

add.name: add
add.description: Add a player to the whitelist.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to add to the whitelist.

remove.name: remove
remove.description: Remove a player from the whitelist.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to remove from the whitelist.

enable.name: enable
enable.description: Enable the whitelist on the minecraft-server.

disable.name: disable
disable.description: Disable the whitelist on the minecraft-server.

message.name: message
message.long_description: Send private chat messages to members on the server. Color codes can be found [here](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Formatting_codes#Color_codes).
message.short_description: Send private chat messages to members on the server.

user.name: user
user.description: Set the user you want to send a (private) message to.

message.name: message
message.description: Set the (private) message you want to send to the user.

chatchannel.name: chatchannel
chatchannel.long_description: Add or remove a channel in which the bot will send minecraft chat messages and logs.
chatchannel.short_description: Add or remove a channel in which the bot will send minecraft chat messages and logs.

webhooks.name: webhooks
webhooks.description: Enable webhook mode for chat messages.

connect.name: connect
connect.long_description:
Connect your minecraft java-edition server or minecraft java-edition account with your bot. Connection methods are:
-ftp (also includes sftp/ftps)
-plugin
-account
**You can download the plugin using [this link](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/smp-plugin.98749/).**
connect.short_description: Connect your minecraft server or account with the bot.
connect.example:
/connect account Lianecx
/connect plugin serverIp
/connect ftp host username password port 1.17

ftp.name: ftp
ftp.description: Connect your Minecraft server using ftp/sftp/ftps.

username.name: username
username.description: Set the ftp-username. (`none` if no username)

password.name: password
password.description: Set the ftp-password (`none` if no password).

plugin.name: plugin
plugin.description: Connect your Minecraft server using ftp/sftp/ftps.

port.name: port
port.description: Set the port of the plugin from the config.yml

account.name: account
account.description: Connect your Minecraft server using ftp/sftp/ftps.

disable.name: disable
disable.long_description:
Disable a specific command/stat/advancement. List of disabled commands/stats/advancements with `/disable list`.
 Command-disabling is also possible through buttons in /help <command>.
disable.example:
/disable commands txp
/disable stats picked_up
/disable advancements adventuring_time
/disable list commands

command.name: command
command.description: Set the command you want to disable

advancement.name: advancement
advancement.description: Set the advancement you want to disable

stat.name: stat
stat.description: Set the stat you want to disable

list.name: list
list.description: Get a list of all disabled stats/advancements/commands

category.name: category
category.description: Set the category which you want to list

disconnect.name: disconnect
disconnect.long_description: Disconnect your minecraft java-edition server or minecraft java-edition account from the bot and delete all saved credentials. To connect again, use `/connect`.
disconnect.short_description: Disconnect your minecraft server or minecraft account from the bot.

enable.name: enable
enable.long_description: Enable a disabled command/stat/advancement (They're all enabled by default). Command-enabling is also possible through buttons in `/help <command>`.
enable.short_description: Enable a disabled command/stat/advancement (All enabled by default)
enable.example:
/enable commands txp
/enable stats picked_up
/enable advancements adventuring_time

command.name: command
command.description: Set the command you want to enable

stat.name: stat
stat.description: Set the stat you want to enable

advancement.name: advancement
advancement.description: Set the advancement you want to enable
